subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch took the lead from Carl Edwards during pit stops with just over 30 laps to go in Richmond, Va., and won his eighth Nascar Nationwide Series race of the season.
snippet: Kyle Busch took the lead from Carl Edwards during pit stops with just over 30 laps to go in Richmond, Va., and won his eighth Nascar Nationwide Series race of the season.
